name: boi de mamão
description:
''boi de mamão'''

This digital art is the second piece, of a series of two, designed to celebrate the folklore of Santa Catarina (BR).

The piece represents the folkloric figure Boi de Mamão.

The story shows the despair of Mateus, a simple cowboy from the interior of the island, who, seeing his pet ox dead, seeks a doctor and a healer to resuscitate him. In the end, the ox comes back to life and everyone celebrates with singing and dancing.


Digital art on Procreate.
2022

by ZALA
